name: Normal Island
description:
Normal Island is an action game in which the girl plays on the small island. Her purpose is to drop all the enemies to the sea. Her push of four stakes will collapse the ground. If she touches enemies, her power will decrease. When her power is set to zero, the game will be over.

If would like to support my works, please consider backing me on patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pigmhall
